PREFIX dcat: <http://www.w3.org/ns/dcat#>
PREFIX dcterms: <http://purl.org/dc/terms/>
PREFIX dgov: <http://data.gov.be#>

INSERT 
	{ 	?dataset dcat:theme <http://publications.europa.eu/resource/authority/data-theme/ENER> .
		?dataset dgov:theme <http://data.gov.be/en/taxonomy/term/35> .
		?dataset dcat:keyword "Energie"@nl, "Energie"@fr, "Energy"@en }
WHERE
	{	?dataset a dcat:Dataset }
